name: Gothenburg European Office
legal: Local Governement (City owned company under swedish law)
goal: Gothenburg European Office represents the city of Gothenburg and its key stakeholders in Brussels and assists with monitoring and lobbying on issues that are relevant fo the City of Gothenburg.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Culture, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Circular Economy Package
Cohesion policy
Urban agenda
Energy effeciency
Performance in Buildings
Smart Cities
